1.verse_text: Happy are those who reject the advice of evil people, who do not follow the example of sinners or join those who have no use for God. and they study it day and night. that bear fruit at the right time, and whose leaves do not dry up. They succeed in everything they do. they are like straw that the wind blows away. and kept apart from God's own people. but the evil are on the way to their doom.
Instead, they find joy in obeying the Law of the Lord ,
They are like trees that grow beside a stream,
But evil people are not like this at all;
Sinners will be condemned by God
The righteous are guided and protected by the Lord ,

2.verse_text: Why do the nations plan rebellion? Why do people make their useless plots? their rulers plot together against the Lord and against the king he chose. “let us throw off their control.” and mocks their feeble plans. and terrifies them with his fury. “I have installed my king.” He said to me: ‘You are my son; today I have become your father. the whole earth will be yours. you will shatter them in pieces like a clay pot.’” learn this lesson, you rulers of the world: tremble or else his anger will be quickly aroused, and you will suddenly die. Happy are all who go to him for protection.
“Let us free ourselves from their rule,” they say;
From his throne in heaven the Lord laughs
Then he warns them in anger
“On Zion, my sacred hill,” he says,
“I will announce,” says the king, “what the Lord has declared.
Ask, and I will give you all the nations;
You will break them with an iron rod;
Now listen to this warning, you kings;

3.verse_text: I have so many enemies, Lord , so many who turn against me! “God will not help him.” you give me victory and restore my courage. and all night long the Lord protects me. who surround me on every side. You punish all my enemies and leave them powerless to harm me. may he bless his people.
They talk about me and say,
But you, O Lord , are always my shield from danger;
I call to the Lord for help, and from his sacred hill he answers me.
I am not afraid of the thousands of enemies
Come, Lord ! Save me, my God!

4.verse_text: Answer me when I pray, O God, my defender! When I was in trouble, you helped me. Be kind to me now and hear my prayer. How long will you love what is worthless and go after what is false? and he hears me when I call to him. think deeply about this, when you lie in silence on your beds. and put your trust in him. “Give us more blessings, O Lord . Look on us with kindness!” is more than they will ever have with all their grain and wine. you alone, O Lord , keep me perfectly safe.
How long will you people insult me?
Remember that the Lord has chosen the righteous for his own,
Tremble with fear and stop sinning;
Offer the right sacrifices to the Lord ,
But the joy that you have given me
When I lie down, I go to sleep in peace;

5.verse_text: Listen to my words, O Lord , and hear my sighs. my God and king! I pray to you, O Lord ; and wait for your answer. you allow no evil in your presence. you hate all wicked people. and despise violent, deceitful people. I can come into your house; I can worship in your holy Temple and bow down to you in reverence. Lead me to do your will; make your way plain for me to follow. they only want to destroy. Their words are flattering and smooth, but full of deadly deceit. may their own plots cause their ruin. Drive them out of your presence because of their many sins and their rebellion against you. they can always sing for joy. Protect those who love you; because of you they are truly happy. your love protects them like a shield.
Listen to my cry for help,
you hear my voice in the morning; at sunrise I offer my prayer
You are not a God who is pleased with wrongdoing;
You cannot stand the sight of the proud;
But because of your great love
Lord , I have so many enemies!
What my enemies say can never be trusted;
Condemn and punish them, O God;
But all who find safety in you will rejoice;
You bless those who obey you, Lord ;

6.verse_text: Lord , don't be angry and rebuke me! Don't punish me in your anger! Give me strength; I am completely exhausted How long, O Lord , will you wait to help me? in your mercy rescue me from death. no one can praise you there. every night my bed is damp from my weeping; my pillow is soaked with tears. my eyes are so swollen from the weeping caused by my enemies. The Lord hears my weeping; and will answer my prayer. in sudden confusion they will be driven away.
I am worn out, O Lord ; have pity on me!
and my whole being is deeply troubled.
In the world of the dead you are not remembered;
I am worn out with grief;
Keep away from me, you evil people!
he listens to my cry for help
My enemies will know the bitter shame of defeat;

7.verse_text: O Lord , my God, I come to you for protection; rescue me and save me from all who pursue me, where no one can save me, and there they will tear me to pieces. if I have betrayed a friend if I have done any of these things— let them cut me down and kill me and leave me lifeless on the ground! Stand up against the fury of my enemies; rouse yourself and help me! Justice is what you demand, Judge in my favor, O Lord ; you know that I am innocent. and judge our thoughts and desires. Stop the wickedness of evildoers and reward those who are good. he saves those who obey him. and always condemns the wicked. God will sharpen his sword. He bends his bow and makes it ready; and aims his burning arrows. they plan trouble and practice deception. they themselves get caught. and are hurt by their own violence. I sing praises to the Lord , the Most High.
or else like a lion they will carry me off
then let my enemies pursue me and catch me,
Rise in your anger, O Lord !
so bring together all the peoples around you,
You are the judge of all people.
If they do not change their ways,
he takes up his deadly weapons
See how wicked people think up evil;
But in the traps they set for others,
So they are punished by their own evil
I thank the Lord for his justice;

8.verse_text: O Lord , our Lord, your greatness is seen in all the world! Your praise reaches up to the heavens; You are safe and secure from all your enemies; you stop anyone who opposes you. at the moon and the stars, which you set in their places— mere mortals, that you care for them? you crowned them with glory and honor. you placed them over all creation: and the creatures in the seas. your greatness is seen in all the world!
it is sung by children and babies.
When I look at the sky, which you have made,
what are human beings, that you think of them;
Yet you made them inferior only to yourself;
You appointed them rulers over everything you made;
sheep and cattle, and the wild animals too;

9.verse_text: I will praise you, Lord , with all my heart; I will tell of all the wonderful things you have done. I will sing praise to you, Almighty God. they fall down and die. and you have judged in my favor. and destroyed the wicked; they will be remembered no more. you have destroyed their cities, and they are completely forgotten. he has set up his throne for judgment. he judges the nations with justice. a place of safety in times of trouble. you do not abandon anyone who comes to you. Tell every nation what he has done! he does not forget their cry, and he punishes those who wrong them. See the sufferings my enemies cause me! Rescue me from death, O Lord , and tell them all the things for which I praise you. I will rejoice because you saved me. they have been caught in their own trap. and the wicked are trapped by their own deeds. of all those who reject God. the hope of the poor will not be crushed forever. Bring the heathen before you and pronounce judgment on them. make them know that they are only mortal beings.
I will sing with joy because of you.
My enemies turn back when you appear;
You are fair and honest in your judgments,
You have condemned the heathen
Our enemies are finished forever;
But the Lord is king forever;
He rules the world with righteousness;
The Lord is a refuge for the oppressed,
Those who know you, Lord , will trust you;
Sing praise to the Lord , who rules in Zion!
God remembers those who suffer;
Be merciful to me, O Lord !
that I may stand before the people of Jerusalem
The heathen have dug a pit and fallen in;
The Lord has revealed himself by his righteous judgments,
Death is the destiny of all the wicked,
The needy will not always be neglected;
Come, Lord ! Do not let anyone defy you!
Make them afraid, O Lord ;

10.verse_text: Why are you so far away, O Lord ? Why do you hide yourself when we are in trouble? catch them in the traps they have made. the greedy curse and reject the Lord . in their pride they think that God doesn't matter. They cannot understand God's judgments; they sneer at their enemies. we will never be in trouble.” they are quick to speak hateful, evil words. waiting to murder innocent people. They spy on their helpless victims; They lie in wait for the poor; they catch them in their traps and drag them away. brute strength has defeated them. He has closed his eyes and will never see me!” Remember those who are suffering! and say to themselves, “He will not punish me”? and are always ready to help. The helpless commit themselves to you; you have always helped the needy. punish them for the wrong they have done until they do it no more. Those who worship other gods will vanish from his land. you will give them courage. you will judge in their favor, so that mortal men may cause terror no more.
The wicked are proud and persecute the poor;
The wicked are proud of their evil desires;
The wicked do not care about the Lord ;
They say to themselves, “We will never fail;
Their speech is filled with curses, lies, and threats;
They hide themselves in the villages,
they wait in their hiding place like lions.
The wicked say to themselves, “God doesn't care!
O Lord , punish those wicked people!
How can the wicked despise God
But you do see; you take notice of trouble and suffering
Break the power of wicked and evil people;
The Lord is king forever and ever.
You will listen, O Lord , to the prayers of the lowly;
You will hear the cries of the oppressed and the orphans;

11.verse_text: I trust in the Lord for safety. How foolish of you to say to me, to shoot from the shadows at good people. when everything falls apart.” he has his throne in heaven. He watches people everywhere and knows what they are doing. the lawless he hates with all his heart. he punishes them with scorching winds. those who do them will live in his presence. “Fly away like a bird to the mountains,
because the wicked have drawn their bows and aimed their arrows
There is nothing a good person can do
The Lord is in his holy temple;
He examines the good and the wicked alike;
He sends down flaming coals and burning sulfur on the wicked;
The Lord is righteous and loves good deeds;

12.verse_text: Help us, Lord ! There is not a good person left; honest people can no longer be found. they deceive each other with flattery. Close those boastful mouths that say, We will say what we wish, and no one can stop us.” “because the needy are oppressed and the persecuted groan in pain. I will give them the security they long for.” they are as genuine as silver refined seven times in the furnace. and everyone praises what is evil. Keep us always safe, O Lord , and preserve us from such people.
All of them lie to one another;
Silence those flattering tongues, O Lord !
“With our words we get what we want.
“But now I will come,” says the Lord ,
The promises of the Lord can be trusted;

13.verse_text: How much longer will you forget me, Lord ? Forever? How much longer will you hide yourself from me? How long will sorrow fill my heart day and night? How long will my enemies triumph over me? Restore my strength; don't let me die. Don't let them gloat over my downfall. I will be glad, because you will rescue me. because you have been good to me.
How long must I endure trouble?
Look at me, O Lord my God, and answer me.
Don't let my enemies say, “We have defeated him.”
I rely on your constant love;
I will sing to you, O Lord ,

14.verse_text: Fools say to themselves, “There is no God!” They are all corrupt, and they have done terrible things; there is no one who does what is right. to see if there are any who are wise, any who worship him. they are all equally bad. Not one of them does what is right, not a single one. “Are all these evildoers ignorant? They live by robbing my people, and they never pray to me.” for God is with those who obey him. but the Lord is their protection. will come to Israel from Zion. How happy the people of Israel will be when the Lord makes them prosperous again!
The Lord looks down from heaven at us humans
But they have all gone wrong;
But then they will be terrified,
Evildoers frustrate the plans of the humble,

15.verse_text: Lord , who may enter your Temple? Who may worship on Zion, your sacred hill? and always do what is right, whose words are true and sincere, They do no wrong to their friends nor spread rumors about their neighbors. but honor those who obey the Lord . They always do what they promise, no matter how much it may cost. and cannot be bribed to testify against the innocent. Whoever does these things will always be secure.
Those who obey God in everything
and who do not slander others.
They despise those whom God rejects,
They make loans without charging interest

16.verse_text: Protect me, O God; I trust in you for safety. all the good things I have come from you.” My greatest pleasure is to be with them. I will not take part in their sacrifices; I will not worship their gods. and you give me all I need; my future is in your hands. how good they are! and in the night my conscience warns me. he is near, and nothing can shake me. and I feel completely secure, I have served you faithfully, and you will not abandon me to the world of the dead. your presence fills me with joy and brings me pleasure forever.
I say to the Lord , “You are my Lord;
How excellent are the Lord 's faithful people!
Those who rush to other gods bring many troubles on themselves.
You, Lord , are all I have,
How wonderful are your gifts to me;
I praise the Lord , because he guides me,
I am always aware of the Lord 's presence;
And so I am thankful and glad,
because you protect me from the power of death.
You will show me the path that leads to life;

17.verse_text: Listen, O Lord , to my plea for justice; pay attention to my cry for help! Listen to my honest prayer. because you know what is right. You have come to me at night; you have examined me completely and found no evil desire in me. I speak no evil, I have obeyed your command and have not followed paths of violence. and have never strayed from it. so turn to me and listen to my words. at your side I am safe from my enemies. hide me in the shadow of your wings Deadly enemies surround me; watching for a chance to pull me down. wanting to tear me to pieces. Save me from the wicked by your sword; Punish them with the sufferings you have stored up for them; may there be enough for their children and some left over for their children's children! and when I awake, your presence will fill me with joy.
You will judge in my favor,
I have always walked in your way
I pray to you, O God, because you answer me;
Reveal your wonderful love and save me;
Protect me as you would your very eyes;
from the attacks of the wicked.
they have no pity and speak proudly.
They are around me now, wherever I turn,
They are like lions, waiting for me,
Come, Lord ! Oppose my enemies and defeat them!
save me from those who in this life have all they want.
But I will see you, because I have done no wrong;

18.verse_text: How I love you, Lord ! You are my defender. he is my strong fortress. My God is my protection, and with him I am safe. He protects me like a shield; he defends me and keeps me safe. and he saves me from my enemies. Praise the Lord ! the waves of destruction rolled over me. and the grave set its trap for me. I called to my God for help. In his temple he heard my voice; he listened to my cry for help. the foundations of the mountains rocked and quivered, because God was angry. a consuming flame and burning coals from his mouth. with a dark cloud under his feet. he traveled on the wings of the wind. thick clouds, full of water, surrounded him. came from the lightning before him and broke through the dark clouds. with flashes of lightning he sent them running. and the foundations of the earth were uncovered, when you rebuked your enemies, Lord , and roared at them in anger. he pulled me out of the deep waters. and from all those who hate me— they were too strong for me. but the Lord protected me. he saved me because he was pleased with me. he blesses me because I am innocent. I have not turned away from my God. I have not disobeyed his commands. that I have kept myself from doing wrong. because he knows that I am innocent. completely good to those who are perfect. but hostile to those who are wicked. but you humble those who are proud. you dispel my darkness. and power to overcome their defenses. How dependable his words! He is like a shield for all who seek his protection. God alone is our defense. who makes my pathway safe. he keeps me safe on the mountains. so that I can use the strongest bow. your care has made me great, and your power has kept me safe. and I have never fallen. I do not stop until I destroy them. they lie defeated before me. and victory over my enemies. I destroy those who hate me. they call to the Lord , but he does not answer. which the wind blows away. I trample on them like mud in the streets. and made me ruler over the nations; people I did not know have now become my subjects. when they hear me, they obey. and come trembling from their fortresses. Proclaim the greatness of the God who saves me. he subdues the nations under me O Lord , you give me victory over my enemies and protect me from violent people. I sing praises to you. he shows constant love to the one he has chosen, to David and his descendants forever.
The Lord is my protector;
I call to the Lord ,
The danger of death was all around me;
The danger of death was around me,
In my trouble I called to the Lord ;
Then the earth trembled and shook;
Smoke poured out of his nostrils,
He tore the sky open and came down
He flew swiftly on his winged creature;
He covered himself with darkness;
Hailstones and flashes of fire
Then the Lord thundered from the sky; and the voice of the Most High was heard.
He shot his arrows and scattered his enemies;
The floor of the ocean was laid bare,
The Lord reached down from above and took hold of me;
He rescued me from my powerful enemies
When I was in trouble, they attacked me,
He helped me out of danger;
The Lord rewards me because I do what is right;
I have obeyed the law of the Lord ;
I have observed all his laws;
He knows that I am faultless,
And so he rewards me because I do what is right,
O Lord , you are faithful to those who are faithful to you;
You are pure to those who are pure,
You save those who are humble,
O Lord , you give me light;
You give me strength to attack my enemies
This God—how perfect are his deeds!
The Lord alone is God;
He is the God who makes me strong,
He makes me sure-footed as a deer;
He trains me for battle,
O Lord , you protect me and save me;
You have kept me from being captured,
I pursue my enemies and catch them;
I strike them down, and they cannot rise;
You give me strength for the battle
You make my enemies run from me;
They cry for help, but no one saves them;
I crush them, so that they become like dust
You saved me from a rebellious people
Foreigners bow before me;
They lose their courage
The Lord lives! Praise my defender!
He gives me victory over my enemies;
and saves me from my foes.
And so I praise you among the nations;
God gives great victories to his king;

19.verse_text: How clearly the sky reveals God's glory! How plainly it shows what he has done! each night repeats it to the next. no sound is heard; and is heard to the ends of the earth. God made a home in the sky for the sun; like an athlete eager to run a race. and goes across to the other. Nothing can hide from its heat. it gives new strength. The commands of the Lord are trustworthy, giving wisdom to those who lack it. and those who obey them are happy. The commands of the Lord are just and give understanding to the mind. it will continue forever. The judgments of the Lord are just; they are always fair. they are sweeter than the purest honey. I am rewarded for obeying them. deliver me, Lord , from hidden faults! don't let them rule over me. Then I shall be perfect and free from the evil of sin. O Lord , my refuge and my redeemer!
Each day announces it to the following day;
No speech or words are used,
yet their message goes out to all the world
it comes out in the morning like a happy bridegroom,
It starts at one end of the sky
The law of the Lord is perfect;
The laws of the Lord are right,
Reverence for the Lord is good;
They are more desirable than the finest gold;
They give knowledge to me, your servant;
None of us can see our own errors;
Keep me safe, also, from willful sins;
May my words and my thoughts be acceptable to you,

20.verse_text: May the Lord answer you when you are in trouble! May the God of Jacob protect you! and give you aid from Mount Zion. and be pleased with all your sacrifices. and make all your plans succeed. and celebrate your triumph by praising our God. May the Lord answer all your requests. he answers him from his holy heaven and by his power gives him great victories. and others in their horses, but we trust in the power of the Lord our God. but we will rise and stand firm.
May he send you help from his Temple
May he accept all your offerings
May he give you what you desire
Then we will shout for joy over your victory
Now I know that the Lord gives victory to his chosen king;
Some trust in their war chariots
Such people will stumble and fall,
Give victory to the king, O Lord ; answer us when we call.

21.verse_text: The king is glad, O Lord , because you gave him strength; he rejoices because you made him victorious. you have answered his request. and set a crown of gold on his head. a long and lasting life. you have given him fame and majesty. and your presence fills him with joy. and because of the Lord 's constant love he will always be secure. he will capture everyone who hates him. when he appears. The Lord will devour them in his anger, and fire will consume them. the king will kill them all. but they will not succeed. and make them turn and run. We will sing and praise your power.
You have given him his heart's desire;
You came to him with great blessings
He asked for life, and you gave it,
His glory is great because of your help;
Your blessings are with him forever,
The king trusts in the Lord Almighty;
The king will capture all his enemies;
He will destroy them like a blazing fire
None of their descendants will survive;
They make their plans, and plot against him,
He will shoot his arrows at them
We praise you, Lord , for your great strength!

22.verse_text: My God, my God, why have you abandoned me? I have cried desperately for help, but still it does not come. but you do not answer; I call at night, but get no rest. the one whom Israel praises. they trusted you, and you saved them. they trusted you and were not disappointed. despised and scorned by everyone! they stick out their tongues and shake their heads. “Why doesn't he save you? If the Lord likes you, why doesn't he help you?” and when I was a baby, you kept me safe. and you have always been my God. Trouble is near, and there is no one to help. they are all around me, like fierce bulls from the land of Bashan. roaring and tearing at me. gone like water spilled on the ground. All my bones are out of joint; my heart is like melted wax. and my tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth. You have left me for dead in the dust. like a pack of dogs they close in on me; My enemies look at me and stare. and divide them among themselves. Come quickly to my rescue! save my life from these dogs. I will praise you in their assembly: Honor him, you descendants of Jacob! Worship him, you people of Israel! he does not turn away from them, but answers when they call for help.” in the presence of those who worship you I will offer the sacrifices I promised. those who come to the Lord will praise him. May they prosper forever! From every part of the world they will turn to him; all races will worship him. and he rules the nations. all mortals will bow down before him. they will speak of the Lord to the coming generation. “The Lord saved his people.”
During the day I call to you, my God,
But you are enthroned as the Holy One,
Our ancestors put their trust in you;
They called to you and escaped from danger;
But I am no longer a human being; I am a worm,
All who see me make fun of me;
“You relied on the Lord ,” they say.
It was you who brought me safely through birth,
I have relied on you since the day I was born,
Do not stay away from me!
Many enemies surround me like bulls;
They open their mouths like lions,
My strength is gone,
My throat is as dry as dust,
An evil gang is around me; they tear at my hands and feet. I am helpless before these wild bulls.
All my bones can be seen.
They gamble for my clothes
O Lord , don't stay away from me!
Save me from the sword;
Rescue me from these lions;
I will tell my people what you have done;
“Praise him, you servants of the Lord !
He does not neglect the poor or ignore their suffering;
In the full assembly I will praise you for what you have done;
The poor will eat as much as they want;
All nations will remember the Lord .
The Lord is king,
All proud people will bow down to him;
Future generations will serve him;
People not yet born will be told:

23.verse_text: The Lord is my shepherd; I have everything I need. and leads me to quiet pools of fresh water. He guides me in the right paths, as he has promised. I will not be afraid, Lord , for you are with me. Your shepherd's rod and staff protect me. where all my enemies can see me; you welcome me as an honored guest and fill my cup to the brim. and your house will be my home as long as I live.
He lets me rest in fields of green grass
Even if I go through the deepest darkness,
You prepare a banquet for me,
I know that your goodness and love will be with me all my life;

24.verse_text: The world and all that is in it belong to the Lord ; the earth and all who live on it are his. and laid its foundations in the ocean depths. Who may enter his holy Temple? who do not worship idols or make false promises. God will declare them innocent. who come into the presence of the God of Jacob. open the ancient doors, and the great king will come in. He is the Lord , strong and mighty, the Lord , victorious in battle. open the ancient doors, and the great king will come in. The triumphant Lord —he is the great king!
He built it on the deep waters beneath the earth
Who has the right to go up the Lord 's hill?
Those who are pure in act and in thought,
The Lord will bless them and save them;
Such are the people who come to God,

25.verse_text: To you, O Lord , I offer my prayer; Save me from the shame of defeat; don't let my enemies gloat over me! but to those who are quick to rebel against you. make them known to me. for you are my God, who saves me. I always trust in you. which you have shown from long ago. In your constant love and goodness, remember me, Lord ! he teaches sinners the path they should follow. and teaches them his will. all who keep his covenant and obey his commands. for they are many. will learn from him the path they should follow. and their children will possess the land. and he affirms his covenant with them. and he rescues me from danger. because I am lonely and weak. and save me from all my troubles. and forgive all my sins. see how much they hate me. keep me from defeat. I come to you for safety. because I trust in you. save your people Israel!
in you, my God, I trust.
Defeat does not come to those who trust in you,
Teach me your ways, O Lord ;
Teach me to live according to your truth,
Remember, O Lord , your kindness and constant love
Forgive the sins and errors of my youth.
Because the Lord is righteous and good,
He leads the humble in the right way
With faithfulness and love he leads
Keep your promise, Lord , and forgive my sins,
Those who have reverence for the Lord
They will always be prosperous,
The Lord is the friend of those who obey him
I look to the Lord for help at all times,
Turn to me, Lord , and be merciful to me,
Relieve me of my worries
Consider my distress and suffering
See how many enemies I have;
Protect me and save me;
May my goodness and honesty preserve me,
From all their troubles, O God,

26.verse_text: Declare me innocent, O Lord , because I do what is right and trust you completely. judge my desires and thoughts. I have nothing to do with hypocrites. and avoid the wicked. and march in worship around your altar. and tell of all your wonderful deeds. the place where your glory dwells. spare me from the fate of murderers— and are always ready to take bribes. be merciful to me and save me! in the assembly of his people I praise the Lord .
Examine me and test me, Lord ;
Your constant love is my guide; your faithfulness always leads me.
I do not keep company with worthless people;
I hate the company of the evil
Lord , I wash my hands to show that I am innocent
I sing a hymn of thanksgiving
I love the house where you live, O Lord ,
Do not destroy me with the sinners;
those who do evil all the time
As for me, I do what is right;
I am safe from all dangers;

27.verse_text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; I will fear no one. The Lord protects me from all danger; I will never be afraid. they stumble and fall. I will not be afraid; even if enemies attack me, one thing only do I want: to live in the Lord 's house all my life, to marvel there at his goodness, and to ask for his guidance. he will keep me safe in his Temple and make me secure on a high rock. With shouts of joy I will offer sacrifices in his Temple; I will sing, I will praise the Lord . Be merciful and answer me! I answered, “I will come, Lord .” Don't be angry with me; don't turn your servant away. You have been my help; don't leave me, don't abandon me, O God, my savior. but the Lord will take care of me. and lead me along a safe path, because I have many enemies. who attack me with lies and threats. the Lord 's goodness in this present life. Have faith, do not despair. Trust in the Lord .
When evil people attack me and try to kill me,
Even if a whole army surrounds me, I will still trust God.
I have asked the Lord for one thing;
In times of trouble he will shelter me;
So I will triumph over my enemies around me.
Hear me, Lord , when I call to you!
My father and mother may abandon me,
Teach me, Lord , what you want me to do,
Don't abandon me to my enemies,
I know that I will live to see

28.verse_text: O Lord , my defender, I call to you. Listen to my cry! If you do not answer me, I will be among those who go down to the world of the dead. when I lift my hands toward your holy Temple. with those who do evil— those whose words are friendly, but who have hatred in their hearts. for the evil they have committed. Punish them for all their deeds; give them what they deserve! or of what he has made; so he will punish them and destroy them forever. he has heard my cry for help. I trust in him. He gives me help and makes me glad; I praise him with joyful songs. he defends and saves his chosen king. and bless those who are yours. Be their shepherd, and take care of them forever.
Hear me when I cry to you for help,

The Lord protects and defends me;

29.verse_text: Praise the Lord , you heavenly beings; praise his glory and power. the glorious God thunders, and his voice echoes over the ocean. in all its might and majesty. even the cedars of Lebanon. and makes Mount Hermon leap like a young bull. he shakes the desert of Kadesh. and strips the leaves from the trees while everyone in his Temple shouts, “Glory to God!” he rules as king forever. and blesses them with peace.
Praise the Lord 's glorious name; bow down before the Holy One when he appears.
The voice of the Lord is heard on the seas;
The voice of the Lord is heard
The voice of the Lord breaks the cedars,
He makes the mountains of Lebanon jump like calves
The voice of the Lord makes the lightning flash.
His voice makes the desert shake;
The Lord 's voice shakes the oaks
The Lord rules over the deep waters;
The Lord gives strength to his people

30.verse_text: I praise you, Lord , because you have saved me and kept my enemies from gloating over me. and you healed me; but you restored my life. all his faithful people! Remember what the Holy One has done, and give him thanks! his goodness for a lifetime. Tears may flow in the night, but joy comes in the morning. “I will never be defeated.” you protected me like a mountain fortress. But then you hid yourself from me, and I was afraid. I begged for your help: What profit from my going to the grave? Are dead people able to praise you? Can they proclaim your unfailing goodness? Help me, Lord !” you have taken away my sorrow and surrounded me with joy. I will sing praise to you. Lord , you are my God; I will give you thanks forever.
I cried to you for help, O Lord my God,
you kept me from the grave. I was on my way to the depths below,
His anger lasts only a moment,
I felt secure and said to myself,
You were good to me, Lord ;
“What will you gain from my death?
Hear me, Lord , and be merciful!
You have changed my sadness into a joyful dance;
So I will not be silent;

31.verse_text: I come to you, Lord , for protection; never let me be defeated. You are a righteous God; save me, I pray! Be my refuge to protect me; my defense to save me. guide me and lead me as you have promised. shelter me from danger. You will save me, Lord ; you are a faithful God. but I trust in you. because of your constant love. You see my suffering; you know my trouble. you have given me freedom to go where I wish. for I am in trouble; my eyes are tired from so much crying; I am completely worn out. and weeping has shortened my life. even my bones are wasting away. treat me with contempt. Those who know me are afraid of me; when they see me in the street, they run away. I am like something thrown away. terror is all around me. They are making plans against me, plotting to kill me. you are my God. save me from my enemies, from those who persecute me. save me in your constant love. don't let me be disgraced. May the wicked be disgraced; may they go silently down to the world of the dead. all the proud and arrogant who speak with contempt about the righteous. you keep for those who honor you! Everyone knows how good you are, how securely you protect those who trust you. from the plots of others; in a safe shelter you hide them from the insults of their enemies. How wonderfully he showed his love for me when I was surrounded and attacked! that he had driven me out of his presence. But he heard my cry, when I called to him for help. The Lord protects the faithful, but punishes the proud as they deserve. all you that hope in the Lord .
Hear me! Save me now!
You are my refuge and defense;
Keep me safe from the trap that has been set for me;
I place myself in your care.
You hate those who worship false gods,
I will be glad and rejoice
You have not let my enemies capture me;
Be merciful to me, Lord ,
I am exhausted by sorrow, I am weak from all my troubles;
All my enemies, and especially my neighbors,
Everyone has forgotten me, as though I were dead;
I hear many enemies whispering;
But my trust is in you, O Lord ;
I am always in your care;
Look on your servant with kindness;
I call to you, Lord ;
Silence those liars—
How wonderful are the good things
You hide them in the safety of your presence
Praise the Lord !
I was afraid and thought
Love the Lord , all his faithful people.
Be strong, be courageous,

32.verse_text: Happy are those whose sins are forgiven, whose wrongs are pardoned. and who is free from all deceit. I was worn out from crying all day long. my strength was completely drained, as moisture is dried up by the summer heat. I did not conceal my wrongdoings. I decided to confess them to you, and you forgave all my sins. when a great flood of trouble comes rushing in, it will not reach them. you will save me from trouble. I sing aloud of your salvation, because you protect me. I will instruct you and advise you. which must be controlled with a bit and bridle to make it submit.” but those who trust in the Lord are protected by his constant love. because of what the Lord has done. You that obey him, shout for joy!
Happy is the one whom the Lord does not accuse of doing wrong
When I did not confess my sins,
Day and night you punished me, Lord ;
Then I confessed my sins to you;
So all your loyal people should pray to you in times of need;
The Lord says, “I will teach you the way you should go;
Don't be stupid like a horse or a mule,
The wicked will have to suffer,
You that are righteous, be glad and rejoice

33.verse_text: All you that are righteous, shout for joy for what the Lord has done; praise him, all you that obey him. sing to him with stringed instruments. play the harp with skill, and shout for joy! and all his works are dependable. his constant love fills the earth. the sun, moon, and stars by his spoken word. he shut up the ocean depths in storerooms. Honor him, all peoples of the world! at his command everything appeared. he keeps them from carrying out their plans. his purposes last eternally. happy are the people he has chosen for his own! and sees all of us humans. on all who live on earth. and knows everything they do. a soldier does not triumph because of his strength. their great strength cannot save. those who trust in his constant love. he keeps them alive in times of famine. he is our protector and our help. we trust in his holy name. as we put our hope in you.
Give thanks to the Lord with harps,
Sing a new song to him,
The words of the Lord are true,
The Lord loves what is righteous and just;
The Lord created the heavens by his command,
He gathered all the seas into one place;
Worship the Lord , all the earth!
When he spoke, the world was created;
The Lord frustrates the purposes of the nations;
But his plans endure forever;
Happy is the nation whose God is the Lord ;
The Lord looks down from heaven
From where he rules, he looks down
He forms all their thoughts
A king does not win because of his powerful army;
War horses are useless for victory;
The Lord watches over those who obey him,
He saves them from death;
We put our hope in the Lord ;
We are glad because of him;
May your constant love be with us, Lord ,

34.verse_text: I will always thank the Lord ; I will never stop praising him. may all who are oppressed listen and be glad! let us praise his name together! he freed me from all my fears. they will never be disappointed. he saves them from all their troubles. and rescues them from danger. Happy are those who find safety with him. those who obey him have all they need. but those who obey the Lord lack nothing good. and I will teach you to honor the Lord . Do you want long life and happiness? and from telling lies. strive for peace with all your heart. and listens to their cries; so that when they die, they are soon forgotten. he rescues them from all their troubles. he saves those who have lost all hope. but the Lord saves them from them all; not one of their bones is broken. those who hate the righteous will be punished. those who go to him for protection will be spared.
I will praise him for what he has done;
Proclaim with me the Lord 's greatness;
I prayed to the Lord , and he answered me;
The oppressed look to him and are glad;
The helpless call to him, and he answers;
His angel guards those who honor the Lord
Find out for yourself how good the Lord is.
Honor the Lord , all his people;
Even lions go hungry for lack of food,
Come, my young friends, and listen to me,
Would you like to enjoy life?
Then keep from speaking evil
Turn away from evil and do good;
The Lord watches over the righteous
but he opposes those who do evil,
The righteous call to the Lord , and he listens;
The Lord is near to those who are discouraged;
Good people suffer many troubles,
the Lord preserves them completely;
Evil will kill the wicked;
The Lord will save his people;

35.verse_text: Oppose those who oppose me, Lord , and fight those who fight against me! and come to my rescue. against those who pursue me. Promise that you will save me. be defeated and disgraced! May those who plot against me be turned back and confused! as the angel of the Lord pursues them! while the angel of the Lord strikes them down! and dug a deep hole to catch me. they will be caught in their own trap and fall to their destruction! I will be happy because he saved me. “There is no one like you. You protect the weak from the strong, the poor from the oppressor.” and accuse me of crimes I know nothing about. and I sink in despair. I deprived myself of food; I prayed with my head bowed low, I went around bent over in mourning, as one who mourns for his mother. and gathered around to make fun of me; strangers beat me and kept striking me. they glared at me with hate. Rescue me from their attacks; save my life from these lions! I will praise you before them all. gloat over my defeat. Don't let those who hate me for no reason smirk with delight over my sorrow. instead they invent all kinds of lies about peace-loving people. “We saw what you did!” So don't be silent, Lord; don't keep yourself far away! rise up, my God, and plead my cause. don't let my enemies gloat over me. “We are rid of him! That's just what we wanted!” be completely defeated and confused; may those who claim to be better than I am be covered with shame and disgrace. shout for joy and say again and again, “How great is the Lord ! He is pleased with the success of his servant.” and I will praise you all day long.
Take your shield and armor
Lift up your spear and war ax
May those who try to kill me
May they be like straw blown by the wind
May their path be dark and slippery
Without any reason they laid a trap for me
But destruction will catch them before they know it;
Then I will be glad because of the Lord ;
With all my heart I will say to the Lord ,
Evil people testify against me
They pay me back evil for good,
But when they were sick, I dressed in mourning;
as I would pray for a friend or a brother.
But when I was in trouble, they were all glad
Like those who would mock a cripple,
How much longer, Lord, will you just look on?
Then I will thank you in the assembly of your people;
Don't let my enemies, those liars,

They accuse me, shouting,
But you, O Lord , have seen this.
Rouse yourself, O Lord, and defend me;

Don't let them say to themselves,
May those who gloat over my suffering
May those who want to see me acquitted
Then I will proclaim your righteousness,

36.verse_text: Sin speaks to the wicked deep in their hearts; they reject God and do not have reverence for him. they think that God will not discover their sin and condemn it. they no longer do what is wise and good. nothing they do is good, and they never reject anything evil. your faithfulness extends to the skies. your justice is like the depths of the sea. People and animals are in your care. you let us drink from the river of your goodness. and because of your light we see the light. and to do good to those who are righteous. or the wicked make me run away. There they lie, unable to rise.
Because they think so highly of themselves,
Their speech is wicked and full of lies;
They make evil plans as they lie in bed;
Lord , your constant love reaches the heavens;
Your righteousness is towering like the mountains;
How precious, O God, is your constant love! We find protection under the shadow of your wings.
We feast on the abundant food you provide;
You are the source of all life,
Continue to love those who know you
Do not let proud people attack me

37.verse_text: Don't be worried on account of the wicked; don't be jealous of those who do wrong. they will die like plants that wither. live in the land and be safe. and he will give you your heart's desire. trust in him, and he will help you; don't be worried about those who prosper or those who succeed in their evil plans. it only leads to trouble. but the wicked will be driven out. you may look for them, but you won't find them; and enjoy prosperity and peace. and glare at them with hate. because he knows they will soon be destroyed. to kill the poor and needy, to slaughter those who do what is right; and their bows will be smashed. is worth more than the wealth of all the wicked, but protect those who are good. and the land will be theirs forever. they will have enough in time of famine. the enemies of the Lord will vanish like wild flowers; they will disappear like smoke. but good people are generous with their gifts. but those who are cursed by him will be driven out. and protects those who please him. because the Lord will help them up. but I have never seen good people abandoned by the Lord or their children begging for food. and their children are a blessing. and your descendants will always live in the land; and does not abandon his faithful people. He protects them forever, but the descendants of the wicked will be driven out. and live in it forever. and they are always fair. and never depart from it. and try to kill them; or let them be condemned when they are on trial. he will honor you by giving you the land, and you will see the wicked driven out. I looked for him, but couldn't find him. peaceful people have descendants, and their descendants are wiped out. and protects them in times of trouble. he saves them from the wicked, because they go to him for protection.
They will soon disappear like grass that dries up;
Trust in the Lord and do good;
Seek your happiness in the Lord ,
Give yourself to the Lord ;
he will make your righteousness shine like the noonday sun.
Be patient and wait for the Lord to act;
Don't give in to worry or anger;

but the humble will possess the land
The wicked plot against good people

but they will be killed by their own swords,
The little that a good person owns
because the Lord will take away the strength of the wicked,

But the wicked will die;

The Lord guides us in the way we should go
If they fall, they will not stay down,
I am old now; I have lived a long time,

Turn away from evil and do good,
for the Lord loves what is right

The words of good people are wise,

but the Lord will not abandon them to their enemy's power
Put your hope in the Lord and obey his commands;
I once knew someone wicked who was a tyrant; he towered over everyone like a cedar of Lebanon;
but later I passed by, and he wasn't there;
Notice good people, observe the righteous;
but sinners are completely destroyed,
The Lord saves the righteous
He helps them and rescues them;

38.verse_text: O Lord , don't punish me in your anger! you have struck me down. my whole body is diseased because of my sins. they are a burden too heavy to bear. my sores stink and rot. I mourn all day long. and I am near death. my heart is troubled, and I groan with pain. you hear all my groans. and my eyes have lost their brightness. because of my sores; even my family keeps away from me. and those who want to hurt me threaten to ruin me; they never stop plotting against me. like the dumb and cannot speak. because they cannot hear. and you, O Lord my God, will answer me. don't let them boast about my downfall! and am in constant pain. they fill me with anxiety. there are many who hate me for no reason. are against me because I try to do right. do not stay away, my God!
You have wounded me with your arrows;
Because of your anger, I am in great pain;
I am drowning in the flood of my sins;
Because I have been foolish,
I am bent over, I am crushed;
I am burning with fever
I am worn out and utterly crushed;
O Lord, you know what I long for;
My heart is pounding, my strength is gone,
My friends and neighbors will not come near me,
Those who want to kill me lay traps for me,
I am like the deaf and cannot hear,
I am like those who do not answer,
But I trust in you, O Lord ;
Don't let my enemies gloat over my distress;
I am about to fall
I confess my sins;
My enemies are healthy and strong;
Those who pay back evil for good
Do not abandon me, O Lord ;
Help me now, O Lord my savior!

39.verse_text: I said, “I will be careful about what I do and will not let my tongue make me sin; I will not say anything while evil people are near.” not even about anything good! But my suffering only grew worse, The more I thought, the more troubled I became; I could not keep from asking: When will I die? Tell me how soon my life will end.” In your sight my lifetime seems nothing. Indeed every living being is no more than a puff of wind, All we do is for nothing; we gather wealth, but don't know who will get it. I put my hope in you. and don't let fools make fun of me. for you are the one who made me suffer like this. I am about to die from your blows. and like a moth you destroy what we love. Indeed we are no more than a puff of wind! and listen to my cry; come to my aid when I weep. Like all my ancestors I am only your guest for a little while. before I go away and am no more.
I kept quiet, not saying a word,
and I was overcome with anxiety.
“ Lord , how long will I live?
How short you have made my life!
What, then, can I hope for, Lord?
Save me from all my sins,
I will keep quiet, I will not say a word,
You punish our sins by your rebukes,
Leave me alone so that I may have some happiness

40.verse_text: I waited patiently for the Lord 's help; then he listened to me and heard my cry. out of the deadly quicksand. He set me safely on a rock and made me secure. a song of praise to our God. Many who see this will take warning and will put their trust in the Lord . who do not turn to idols or join those who worship false gods. there is no one like you! You have made many wonderful plans for us. I could never speak of them all— their number is so great! you do not ask for animals burned whole on the altar or for sacrifices to take away sins. Instead, you have given me ears to hear you, I keep your teaching in my heart.” I told the good news that you save us. You know that I will never stop telling it. I have always spoken of your faithfulness and help. In the assembly of all your people I have not been silent about your loyalty and constant love. Your love and loyalty will always keep me safe. too many to count! My sins have caught up with me, and I can no longer see; they are more than the hairs of my head, and I have lost my courage. be completely defeated and confused. May those who are happy because of my troubles be turned back and disgraced. be dismayed by their defeat. be glad and joyful. May all who are thankful for your salvation always say, “How great is the Lord !” but you have not forgotten me. You are my savior and my God— hurry to my aid!
He pulled me out of a dangerous pit,
He taught me to sing a new song,
Happy are those who trust the Lord ,
You have done many things for us, O Lord our God;
You do not want sacrifices and offerings;
and so I answered, “Here I am; your instructions for me are in the book of the Law.
How I love to do your will, my God!
In the assembly of all your people, Lord ,
I have not kept the news of salvation to myself;
Lord , I know you will never stop being merciful to me.
I am surrounded by many troubles—
Save me, Lord ! Help me now!
May those who try to kill me
May those who make fun of me
May all who come to you
I am weak and poor, O Lord,

41.verse_text: Happy are those who are concerned for the poor; the Lord will help them when they are in trouble. he will make them happy in the land; he will not abandon them to the power of their enemies. and will restore them to health. be merciful to me and heal me.” They want me to die and be forgotten. they gather bad news about me and then go out and tell it everywhere. he will never leave his bed again.” the one who shared my food, has turned against me. and I will pay my enemies back. and I will know that you are pleased with me. you will keep me in your presence forever. Praise him now and forever! Amen! Amen!
The Lord will protect them and preserve their lives;
The Lord will help them when they are sick
I said, “I have sinned against you, Lord ;
My enemies say cruel things about me.
Those who come to see me are not sincere;
All who hate me whisper to each other about me, they imagine the worst about me.
Even my best friend, the one I trusted most,
Be merciful to me, Lord , and restore my health,
They will not triumph over me,
You will help me, because I do what is right;
Praise the Lord , the God of Israel!

42.verse_text: As a deer longs for a stream of cool water, so I long for you, O God. When can I go and worship in your presence? and tears are my only food; all the time my enemies ask me, “Where is your God?” when I went with the crowds to the house of God and led them as they walked along, a happy crowd, singing and shouting praise to God. Why am I so troubled? I will put my hope in God, and once again I will praise him, my savior and my God. and so I turn my thoughts to him. He has sent waves of sorrow over my soul; chaos roars at me like a flood, like waterfalls thundering down to the Jordan from Mount Hermon and Mount Mizar. so that I may have a song at night, a prayer to the God of my life. “Why have you forgotten me? Why must I go on suffering from the cruelty of my enemies?” as they keep on asking me, “Where is your God?” Why am I so troubled? I will put my hope in God, and once again I will praise him, my savior and my God.
I thirst for you, the living God.
My heart breaks when I remember the past,
May the Lord show his constant love during the day,
To God, my defender, I say,
I am crushed by their insults,

43.verse_text: O God, declare me innocent, and defend my cause against the ungodly; deliver me from lying and evil people! why have you abandoned me? Why must I go on suffering from the cruelty of my enemies? may they lead me and to your Temple, where you live. you are the source of my happiness. I will play my harp and sing praise to you, O God, my God. Why am I so troubled? I will put my hope in God, and once again I will praise him, my savior and my God.
Send your light and your truth; and bring me back to Zion, your sacred hill,
Then I will go to your altar, O God;

44.verse_text: With our own ears we have heard it, O God— our ancestors have told us about it, about the great things you did in their time, in the days of long ago: and established your people in their land; how you punished the other nations and caused your own to prosper. they did not win it by their own power; it was by your power and your strength, by the assurance of your presence, which showed that you loved them. or in my sword to save me; and defeated those who hate us. and give thanks to you forever. you no longer march out with our armies. and they took for themselves what was ours. you scattered us in foreign countries. and they mock us and laugh at us. they shake their heads at us in scorn. I am covered with shame of my enemies and those who hate me. even though we have not forgotten you or broken the covenant you made with us. we have not disobeyed your commands. you abandoned us in deepest darkness. and prayed to a foreign god, because you know our secret thoughts. that we are treated like sheep to be slaughtered. Rouse yourself! Don't reject us forever! Don't forget our suffering and trouble! we lie defeated in the dust. Because of your constant love save us!
how you yourself drove out the heathen
Your people did not conquer the land with their swords;
You are my king and my God; you give victory to your people, as though they had little value.
and by your power we defeat our enemies.
I do not trust in my bow
but you have saved us from our enemies
We will always praise you
But now you have rejected us and let us be defeated;
You made us run from our enemies,
You allowed us to be slaughtered like sheep;
You sold your own people for a small price
Our neighbors see what you did to us,
You have made us a joke among the nations;
I am always in disgrace;
from hearing the sneers and insults
All this has happened to us,
We have not been disloyal to you;
Yet you left us helpless among wild animals;
If we had stopped worshiping our God
you would surely have discovered it,
But it is on your account that we are being killed all the time,
Wake up, Lord! Why are you asleep?
Why are you hiding from us?
We fall crushed to the ground;
Come to our aid!

45.verse_text: Beautiful words fill my mind, as I compose this song for the king. Like the pen of a good writer my tongue is ready with a poem. you are an eloquent speaker. God has always blessed you. you are glorious and majestic. Your strength will win you great victories! they pierce the hearts of your enemies; nations fall down at your feet. will last forever and ever. You rule over your people with justice; That is why God, your God, has chosen you and has poured out more happiness on you than on any other king. musicians entertain you in palaces decorated with ivory. and at the right of your throne stands the queen, wearing ornaments of finest gold. forget your people and your relatives. he is your master, so you must obey him. rich people will try to win your favor. Her gown is made of gold thread. followed by her bridesmaids, and they also are brought to him. and enter the king's palace. to succeed your ancestors as kings, and you will make them rulers over the whole earth. and everyone will praise you for all time to come.
You are the most handsome of men;
Buckle on your sword, mighty king;
Ride on in majesty to victory for the defense of truth and justice!
The kingdom that God has given you
you love what is right and hate what is evil.
The perfume of myrrh and aloes is on your clothes;
Among the women of your court are daughters of kings,
Bride of the king, listen to what I say—
Your beauty will make the king desire you;
The people of Tyre will bring you gifts;
The princess is in the palace—how beautiful she is!
In her colorful gown she is led to the king,
With joy and gladness they come
You, my king, will have many sons
My song will keep your fame alive forever,

46.verse_text: God is our shelter and strength, always ready to help in times of trouble. and mountains fall into the ocean depths; and the hills are shaken by the violence. to the sacred house of the Most High. at early dawn he will come to its aid. God thunders, and the earth dissolves. the God of Jacob is our refuge. See what amazing things he has done on earth. he breaks bows, destroys spears, and sets shields on fire. supreme among the nations, supreme over the world.” the God of Jacob is our refuge.
So we will not be afraid, even if the earth is shaken
even if the seas roar and rage,
There is a river that brings joy to the city of God,
God is in that city, and it will never be destroyed;
Nations are terrified, kingdoms are shaken;
The Lord Almighty is with us;
Come and see what the Lord has done.
He stops wars all over the world;
“Stop fighting,” he says, “and know that I am God,
The Lord Almighty is with us;

47.verse_text: Clap your hands for joy, all peoples! Praise God with loud songs! he is a great king, ruling over all the world. he made us rule over the nations. the proud possession of his people, whom he loves. There are shouts of joy and the blast of trumpets, as the Lord goes up. sing praise to our king! praise him with songs! he rules over the nations. More powerful than all armies is he; he rules supreme.
The Lord , the Most High, is to be feared;
He gave us victory over the peoples;
He chose for us the land where we live,
God goes up to his throne.
God is king over all the world;
God sits on his sacred throne;
The rulers of the nations assemble with the people of the God of Abraham.

48.verse_text: The Lord is great and is to be highly praised in the city of our God, on his sacred hill. the city of the great king brings joy to all the world. inside the fortresses of the city. and came to attack Mount Zion. they were afraid and ran away. like a woman about to bear a child, and now we have seen it in the city of our God, the Lord Almighty; he will keep the city safe forever. we think of your constant love. and your fame extends over all the earth. You rule with justice; You give right judgments; let there be joy in the cities of Judah! so that you may tell the next generation: he will lead us for all time to come.”
Zion, the mountain of God, is high and beautiful;
God has shown that there is safety with him
But when they saw it, they were amazed;
There they were seized with fear and anguish,
like ships tossing in a furious storm.
We have heard what God has done,
You are praised by people everywhere,
let the people of Zion be glad!
People of God, walk around Zion and count the towers;
take notice of the walls and examine the fortresses,
“This God is our God forever and ever;

49.verse_text: Hear this, everyone! Listen, all people everywhere, rich and poor together.
